0x01000001=A
0x01000010=B
0x01000011=C
0x01000100=D
0x01000101=E
0x01000110=F
0x01000111=G
0x01001000=H
0x01001001=I
0x01001010=J
0x01001011=K
0x01001100=L
0x01001101=M
0x01001110=N
0x01001111=O
0x01010000=P
0x01010001=Q
0x01010010=R
0x01010011=S
0x01010100=T
0x01010101=U
0x01010110=V
0x01010111=W
0x01011000=X
0x01011001=Y
0x01011010=Z
:: lower
1x01100001=a
1x01100010=b
1x01100011=c
1x01100100=d
1x01100101=e
1x01100110=f
1x01100111=g
1x01101000=h
1x01101001=i
1x01101010=j
1x01101011=k
1x01101100=l
1x01101101=m
1x01101110=n
1x01101111=o
1x01110000=p
1x01110001=q
1x01110010=r
1x01110011=s
1x01110100=t
1x01110101=u
1x01110110=v
1x01110111=w
1x01111000=x
1x01111001=y
1x01111010=z
:: integer
2x00000000=0
2x00000001=1
2x00000010=2
2x00000011=3
2x00000100=4
2x00000101=5
2x00000110=6
2x00000111=7
2x00001000=8
2x00001001=9
2x00001010=10
